trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around September 30th 2007
divs: Sighting Details well, i was at Irvington and bantam in south tucson, near 6th, i was outside with my friends when out of the no where a ball of silver of a moving shiny object came. i rushed inside to get a camera but when i got out it disappeared. a while later the same object appeared again and disappeared. then the some stars in the sky started twinkling altot
